BasicInfo.short: Dogster is an online network enabling dog owners to create profiles of their dogs, share pictures and videos, and obtain expert advice.

Products.name: Dogster
Products.description: Login to Dogster to connect with other people obsessed with their pets. Upload all your digital dog media and share it with your friends or
